post.title: what are your top 5 xbla games?
post.content: just curious what everyone likes. maybe i'm missing out on a hidden gem! mine: 1 (tied). puzzle quest 1 (tied). n+ 3. pinball fx 4. prince of persia: classic 5. carcassonne *lumines live would be on this list if i could play it with the dualshock d-pad.
